definition[0]: the act of travelling through a place in order to find out about it or find something such as oil or gold in it
example[0]: oil exploration facilities in the North Sea
example[1]: You can then use this hut as a base for explorations into the mountains around.
definition[1]: when you try to find out more about something by discussing it, thinking about it etc
example[3]: an exploration into how an abused child becomes an abuser
